newsArray.title: Ranji Trophy: Ruturaj Gaikwad Slams Umpiring Standards. Check His Viral Insta Post
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: India batter Ruturaj Gaikwad, currently in Australia for India AтАЩs 2-match unofficial Test series, expressed frustration over a controversial dismissal in the Ranji Trophy. Despite being away, Gaikwad is closely following MaharashtraтАЩs campaign back home. During the Maharashtra vs Services match in Pune, stand-in captain Ankit Bawne was involved in a contentious dismissal, which led Gaikwad to voice his disapproval on social media."How can this be given out in a live game???. Shame to even appeal for a catch. Absolutely pathetic," Gaikwad wrote in the story that he posted on his official Instagram account.Here's what Ruturaj Gaikwad Posted on Instagram:Ruturaj Gaikwad was fuming with Ankit Bawne's controversial dismissal against Services #RanjiTrophy2024 Source: Gaikwad's Instagram story pic.twitter.com/HParORg3YQтАФ Vijeet Rathi (@vijeet_rathi) November 7, 2024 More to follow.

newsArray.title: England announce squads for all-format South Africa tour; Capsey dropped from T20Is, Kemp called up for Tests
newsArray.description: England have announced their squads for the all-format tour of South Africa with Heather Knight retained as captain. Alice Capsey has been omitted while all-rounder Danielle Gibson is out due to her operation on her left knee as the only two changes from the T20 World Cup squad. Capsey didn't bowl and returned scores of 9, 19 and 1 in three matches and hence was the only casualty from the T20 side with Paige Schofield getting a call-up.

newsArray.title: 'X' Reacts On KL Rahul's Horrific Leave To Get Dismissed Vs Australia-A | WATCH
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: KL Rahul Bizarre Dismissal Vs AUS-A: Things are getting from bad to worse for KL Rahul, as the Indian batter continues his horrendous form in red-ball cricket with yet another dismal performance.The talented batsman from Karnataka, who was once deemed as the next big thing in Indian cricket, is now finding it extremely difficult to sustain his place in the 15-man squad for the future, let alone playing XI.On Friday, during the 2nd Unofficial Test against Australia-A at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, the right-handed batsman produced one of the most bizarre dismissals ever, as a тАШbrain fadeтАЩ moment was at display during his extremely weird leave off Corey RocchiccioliтАЩs bowling during the 18th over of the 2nd innings.Watch the dismissal below:"Don't know what he was thinking!"Oops... that's an astonishing leave by KL Rahul ЁЯШ▒ #AUSAvINDA pic.twitter.com/e4uDPH1dzzтАФ cricket.com.au (@cricketcomau) November 8, 2024India-A are now reeling at 73/5 at Stumps, Day 2, in what was a forgettable day for the Asian side, as they let the hosts regain stability from a troubled position.Ruuraj Gaikwad's side are now 11 runs ahead but with only 5 wickets in hand, and India-A are potentially staring at the barrel of yet another thumping defeat at the hands of Nathan McSweeney's side.'X' Reacts As KL Rahul Produces Yet Another Disastrous PerformanceFans on 'X' have expressed their feelings towards KL Rahul's constant failures in red-ball cricket and have started mocking the cricketer by stating that 'he finds new and bizarre ways to get dismissed.Let's have a look at some of the viral tweets:KL Rahul ЁЯлб ЁЯдгЁЯдгhow does this man innovates new ways to throw his wicket. pic.twitter.com/iDwdXzW2UsтАФ Haasay Wabib ЁЯППюиА (@CaughtAtGully) November 8, 2024What happened to KL Rahul against Australia A today? ЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ЁЯТФ I have never seen a dismissal like this in my life before, this is so embarrassing ЁЯШнЁЯШнЁЯШн pic.twitter.com/rD1TzCkmxJтАФ Farid Khan (@_FaridKhan) November 8, 2024There's no way even KL Rahul fans can defend him ЁЯдбpic.twitter.com/WtGlWQjYtqтАФ Dinda Academy (@academy_dinda) November 8, 2024In my playing days, if you are averaging 35, your dad will come and buy you a basketball or footy for you to play - Ricky Ponting What should Sunil Shetty must buy for KL Rahul? pic.twitter.com/SG69XdsEU3тАФ BRUTU #AUG21 тЭдя╕П (@Brutu24) November 8, 2024KL Rahul has forgotten how to play cricket. Since last 4 years he is playing from recommendation quota rather than performance. pic.twitter.com/RcxtXgICI7тАФ Satya Prakash (@_SatyaPrakash08) November 8, 2024@BCCI this is an insult to the game, the legacy of ranji cricket that kl rahul keeps being selected over sweat and toil of millions of other kids, if there is any shame left, do a course correction- yeh parchi system ka kya kijieyga???? @imAagarkarтАФ Munda Chan Varga (@munda53870363) November 8, 2024KL Rahul got bowled because he was momentarily distracted by a butterfly fluttering across the pitch. It was such a rare and beautiful sight that he couldn't help but lose focus for just a split second. Nature has its way of reminding us to appreciate the little things.тАФ Hemant Sawakare (@rush2hemant) November 8, 2024

ЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ЁЯТФ I have never seen a dismissal like this in my life before, this is so embarrassing ЁЯШнЁЯШнЁЯШн pic.twitter.com/rD1TzCkmxJтАФ Farid Khan (@_FaridKhan) November 8, 2024There's no way even KL Rahul fans can defend him ЁЯдбpic.twitter.com/WtGlWQjYtqтАФ Dinda Academy (@academy_dinda) November 8, 2024In my playing days, if you are averaging 35, your dad will come and buy you a basketball or footy for you to play - Ricky Ponting What should Sunil Shetty must buy for KL Rahul? pic.twitter.com/SG69XdsEU3тАФ BRUTU #AUG21 тЭдя╕П (@Brutu24) November 8, 2024KL Rahul has forgotten how to play cricket. Since last 4 years he is playing from recommendation quota rather than performance. pic.twitter.com/RcxtXgICI7тАФ Satya Prakash (@_SatyaPrakash08) November 8, 2024@BCCI this is an insult to the game, the legacy of ranji cricket that kl rahul keeps being selected over sweat and toil of millions of other kids, if there is any shame left, do a course correction- yeh parchi system ka kya kijieyga???? @imAagarkarтАФ Munda Chan Varga (@munda53870363) November 8, 2024KL Rahul got bowled because he was momentarily distracted by a butterfly fluttering across the pitch. newsArray.title: England announce squads for all-format South Africa tour; Capsey dropped from T20Is, Kemp called up for Tests
newsArray.description: England have announced their squads for the all-format tour of South Africa with Heather Knight retained as captain. Alice Capsey has been omitted while all-rounder Danielle Gibson is out due to her operation on her left knee as the only two changes from the T20 World Cup squad. Capsey didn't bowl and returned scores of 9, 19 and 1 in three matches and hence was the only casualty from the T20 side with Paige Schofield getting a call-up.

newsArray.description: KL Rahul Bizarre Dismissal Vs AUS-A: Things are getting from bad to worse for KL Rahul, as the Indian batter continues his horrendous form in red-ball cricket with yet another dismal performance.The talented batsman from Karnataka, who was once deemed as the next big thing in Indian cricket, is now finding it extremely difficult to sustain his place in the 15-man squad for the future, let alone playing XI.On Friday, during the 2nd Unofficial Test against Australia-A at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, the right-handed batsman produced one of the most bizarre dismissals ever, as a тАШbrain fadeтАЩ moment was at display during his extremely weird leave off Corey RocchiccioliтАЩs bowling during the 18th over of the 2nd innings.Watch the dismissal below:"Don't know what he was thinking!"Oops... that's an astonishing leave by KL Rahul ЁЯШ▒ #AUSAvINDA pic.twitter.com/e4uDPH1dzzтАФ cricket.com.au (@cricketcomau) November 8, 2024India-A are now reeling at 73/5 at Stumps, Day 2, in what was a forgettable day for the Asian side, as they let the hosts regain stability from a troubled position.Ruuraj Gaikwad's side are now 11 runs ahead but with only 5 wickets in hand, and India-A are potentially staring at the barrel of yet another thumping defeat at the hands of Nathan McSweeney's side.'X' Reacts As KL Rahul Produces Yet Another Disastrous PerformanceFans on 'X' have expressed their feelings towards KL Rahul's constant failures in red-ball cricket and have started mocking the cricketer by stating that 'he finds new and bizarre ways to get dismissed.Let's have a look at some of the viral tweets:KL Rahul ЁЯлб ЁЯдгЁЯдгhow does this man innovates new ways to throw his wicket. pic.twitter.com/iDwdXzW2UsтАФ Haasay Wabib ЁЯППюиА (@CaughtAtGully) November 8, 2024What happened to KL Rahul against Australia A today? ЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ЁЯТФ I have never seen a dismissal like this in my life before, this is so embarrassing ЁЯШнЁЯШнЁЯШн pic.twitter.com/rD1TzCkmxJтАФ Farid Khan (@_FaridKhan) November 8, 2024There's no way even KL Rahul fans can defend him ЁЯдбpic.twitter.com/WtGlWQjYtqтАФ Dinda Academy (@academy_dinda) November 8, 2024In my playing days, if you are averaging 35, your dad will come and buy you a basketball or footy for you to play - Ricky Ponting What should Sunil Shetty must buy for KL Rahul? pic.twitter.com/SG69XdsEU3тАФ BRUTU #AUG21 тЭдя╕П (@Brutu24) November 8, 2024KL Rahul has forgotten how to play cricket. Since last 4 years he is playing from recommendation quota rather than performance. pic.twitter.com/RcxtXgICI7тАФ Satya Prakash (@_SatyaPrakash08) November 8, 2024@BCCI this is an insult to the game, the legacy of ranji cricket that kl rahul keeps being selected over sweat and toil of millions of other kids, if there is any shame left, do a course correction- yeh parchi system ka kya kijieyga???? @imAagarkarтАФ Munda Chan Varga (@munda53870363) November 8, 2024KL Rahul got bowled because he was momentarily distracted by a butterfly fluttering across the pitch. It was such a rare and beautiful sight that he couldn't help but lose focus for just a split second. Nature has its way of reminding us to appreciate the little things.тАФ Hemant Sawakare (@rush2hemant) November 8, 2024
